contentrichtext.text: [[File:Romanian Minister Zsolt Nagy.jpg|thumbnail|250px|right|Zsolt Nagy in May 2006]] '''Zsolt Nagy''' (born on June 21, 1971 in [[Târgu Mureş]]) is a [[Romania]]n politician of [[Hungarian minority in Romania|Hungarian ethnicity]]. Since December 2004, he is the Minister for Communications and Information Technology, but he was suspended on June 11, 2007 due to an investigation regarding some strategic privatisations. He is also a member of the [[Democratic Union of Hungarians in Romania]], which is part of the governing coalition. He speaks [[Romanian language|Romanian]], [[Hungarian language|Hungarian]] and [[English language|English]] fluently. He is an alumnus of the [[Technical University of Cluj-Napoca|Technical University]] of [[Cluj-Napoca]]. ==References== *[[Ministry of Communications and Information Technology of Romania]].
